title: Routine Dental Check-up
coverage: 100% covered, up to 2 times a year
description: Includes professional cleaning, scaling, polishing, and a full dental examination to maintain your oral health.

title: Major Dental Procedures
description: Coverage for essential procedures like root canals, tooth extractions, and cavity fillings.

title: Orthodontic Treatment
description: Support for orthodontic needs, including braces and aligners, for both adults and children.

title: Therapy & Counseling Sessions
description: Confidential access to licensed therapists and counselors for online or in-person sessions.

title: Mindfulness & Meditation Apps
description: Get a free premium subscription to popular wellness apps like Calm or Headspace.

title: Annual Eye Examination
description: A comprehensive eye exam with a network optometrist to check your vision and eye health.

title: Eyewear Reimbursement
description: Get reimbursed for prescription glasses, contact lenses, and frames from any provider.

title: General Physician Consultation
description: Coverage for out-patient doctor visits for general health concerns, fever, or injuries.

title: Pharmacy & Medication
description: Reimbursement for prescribed medications and pharmacy bills for out-patient treatments.

title: Diagnostic Tests & Labs
description: Support for prescribed diagnostic tests, including blood work, X-rays, and scans.
